text.div:
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/statistic-model-code defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
effectsFixed Fixed-effects meta-analysis From a fixed-effects meta-analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
effectsRandom Random-effects meta-analysis From a random-effects meta-analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
methodTau Tau estimation method Method used for estimating tau squared (used with a random-effects meta-analysis), pair with valueCodeableConcept.
poolMethod Pooling method Method used to pool results, pair with valueCodeableConcept.
hartungKnapp Hartung-Knapp adjustment Hartung-Knapp/Hartung-Knapp-Sidik-Jonkman adjustment used, pair with valueBoolean.
modifiedHartungKnapp Modified Hartung-Knapp adjustment Modified Hartung-Knapp/Hartung-Knapp-Sidik-Jonkman adjustment used, pair with valueBoolean.
zeroCellNumerical Zero-cell adjustment with constant Zero-cell adjustment done by adding a constant to all cells of affected studies, pair with valueSimpleQuantity.
zeroCellTreatmentArmContinuityCorrection Zero-cell adjustment with continuity correction Zero-cell adjustment done by treatment arm continuity correction, pair with valueBoolean.
adjusted Adjusted analysis Used for adjusted analysis, pair with variable instead of value[x].
linearRegression Linear Regression Used for linear regression method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
logisticRegression Logistic Regression Used for logistic regression method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
anova Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) Used for ANOVA method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
coxProportionalHazards Cox Proportional Hazards Used for Cox proportional hazards method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.

concept.definition: From a fixed-effects meta-analysis, pair with valueBoolean.

Zero-cell adjustment done by adding a constant to all cells of affected studies, pair with valueSimpleQuantity.
Zero-cell adjustment done by treatment arm continuity correction, pair with valueBoolean.
Used for adjusted analysis, pair with variable instead of value[x].
Used for linear regression method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
Used for logistic regression method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
Used for ANOVA method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
Used for Cox proportional hazards method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
